author: guitargeek
body:
#### PR description:

Part of the series of PRs that merges `.h` files with the `.cc` files of the plugins in the RecoParticleFlow subsystem.

This has already been done for the RecoEgamma and RecoEcal subsystem (see e.g. https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/33935, etc.).

It makes maintaining the plugins much easier and also excludes the possibility to wrongly include plugin header files.

#### PR validation:

CMSSW compiles.

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR:

No backport intended.
title: Merge .h and .cc files of RecoParticleFlow/PFTracking plugins
